errors.error_description: Installation steps are in wrong order - pip install command before cd command
correction_candidates:
Clone the repository:
`git clone https://github.com/spacetelescope/pysiaf`
Install pysiaf:
`cd pysiaf`
`pip install .`

First clone the repository:
`git clone https://github.com/spacetelescope/pysiaf`
Then navigate and install:
`cd pysiaf && pip install .`

Download and install:
`git clone https://github.com/spacetelescope/pysiaf`
`cd pysiaf`
`python setup.py install`

Get the code and install:
`git clone https://github.com/spacetelescope/pysiaf`
`cd pysiaf`
`pip install -r requirements.txt && pip install .`
errors.golden_answer:
Clone the repository:
`git clone https://github.com/spacetelescope/pysiaf`
Install pysiaf:
`cd pysiaf`
`pip install .`
